content:
ICS 8 - Introduction to Computer Security Homework 8, 50 Points
Due: Thursday, December 2, 2010, at the beginnning of class

  1. Problem R-7.4 from Chapter 7, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  2. Problem R-7.7 from Chapter 7, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  3. Problem R-7.10 from Chapter 7, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  4. Problem R-8.2 from Chapter 8, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  5. Problem R-8.12 from Chapter 8, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  6. Problem R-8.25 from Chapter 8, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  7. Perform the following project: Send an Encrypted Message via Email. 20 points.
Please write no more than a single paragraph for an answer to any R- or C-question. In many cases, a single sentence could be sufficient.
